Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the idea that CNN and other news media outlets intentionally buried the Justine Damond shooting story.
Understate: The claim understates the fact that CNN and other news media outlets have been following the story closely and reporting on it.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that the news media buried the story due to the race and religion of the individuals involved.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the news media's coverage of the story was influenced by the race and religion of the officer who shot Justine Damond.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations for why the news media may have covered the story, such as its newsworthiness and the attention it received locally and internationally.
